entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
